xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:jstring="java.lang.String" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:variable name="escapedQuote" select="'\\\"'" /> <xsl:variable name="quote" select="'"'" /> <xsl:variable name="backSlash"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">\\</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="escapedBackSlash"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">\\\\</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="GT"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">></xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="escapedLT"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">&lt;</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="LT"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"><</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="escapedGT"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">&gt;</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="twoBackSlashAndDoubleQuote" select="'\\"'" /> <xsl:variable name="oneBackSlashAndDoubleQuote" select="'\"'" /> <xsl:variable name="escapedAmpersand"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">&amp;</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="ampersand"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">&</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quoteAndUnderscore" select="'"_'" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:element name="{$rootName}"> <xsl:variable name="var1" select="jstring:replaceAll(jstring:new(.), $escapedQuote, $quote)" /> <xsl:variable name="var2" select="jstring:replaceAll($var1, $backSlash, $escapedBackSlash)" /> <xsl:variable name="var3" select="jstring:replaceAll($var2, $LT, $escapedLT)" /> <xsl:variable name="var4" select="jstring:replaceAll($var3, $GT, $escapedGT)" /> <xsl:variable name="var5" select="jstring:replaceAll($var4, $twoBackSlashAndDoubleQuote, $oneBackSlashAndDoubleQuote)" /> <xsl:variable name="var6" select="jstring:replaceAll($var5, $ampersand, '')" /> <xsl:variable name="var7" select="jstring:replaceAll($var6, $quoteAndUnderscore, $quote)" /> <xsl:value-of select="$var7" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootElem" select="'event'" /> <xsl:variable name="eol"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quote" select=""'"" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:element name="{$rootElem}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="/*/*/*" mode="nodeNameChange" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="node()|@*" mode="nodeNameChange"> <xsl:variable name="nodeName" select="name()" /> <xsl:variable name="newName"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($nodeName, '_')"> <xsl:value-of select="translate($nodeName,"_","-")" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$nodeName" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:element name="{$newName}"> <xsl:value-of select="translate(translate(., $eol, ''), $quote, '')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:jstring="java.lang.String" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="backslash"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">\</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="backslash2"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">\\</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="escapedBackslash"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">\\\\</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(./text(), $backslash)"> <xsl:variable name="elemName" select="name(.)" /> <xsl:element name="{$elemName}"> <xsl:value-of select="jstring:replaceAll(jstring:new(text()), $backslash2, $escapedBackslash)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Convert Event data in JSON format to XML. 1. Replace underscore in key name to hypen. 2. Convert JSON to XML.
